item.title: CVE-2024-37487|2024-07-21T07:32:26.388Z -- wpdirectorykit.com -- wp%20directory%20kit
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in wpdirectorykit.Com WP Directory Kit allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects WP Directory Kit: from n/a through 1.3.5.
